name: Rubble (Walid Raouda)
description:
A tragic tale about a person trapped underground. 

Shoutouts to Alain Daher and Nidal Dakmak for help with music and visuals.

Due to  crucial mistake while exporting, the code has been deleted. Unfortunately, this will the the final iteration of Rubble.

Some known bugs include: 

1) The chime sound will continue to play throughout the game unless activated at the start screen. Before pressing play, please press anywhere around the background of the start menu to trigger the first ring. The music should work from then on out

2) A few of the scenes in the second act of the game do not transition well, creating black text boxes. 

3) The battery icon on the top right does not follow different transitions

4) On reset, the game's variables do not reset. Breaking the game upon second play through. To fix this, please reset the browser.

5) One of the endings is not coded in correctly. Currently, there is only one way to get to an end state and it I by "Calling out" or "Loosing it" in the 2nd act. Or letting the timer reach 0. This will lead you to the end screen.

If you find any other bugs, please let me know.
